extras.zoom.option.name: Zoom
extras.extras.options.name: Extras
extras.cloud_height.name: Cloud Height
extras.fog.name: Enable fog
extras.fog.tooltip: Toggles off all fog in the overworld.
extras.full_screen_mode.name: Fullscreen Mode
extras.full_screen_mode.tooltip:
Windowed - the game will display in a small window.
Borderless - the game will be fullscreened, and locked to your monitor's refresh rate, but allow you to tab out easily.
Fullscreen - the game will display in native fullscreen mode.
extras.display_fps.display.name: Display FPS
extras.display_fps.display.tooltip: Displays the current FPS. Advanced mode also displays minimum FPS, as well as 15 second average FPS, which are more useful for judging performance.
extras.display_fps.position.name: FPS Display Position
extras.display_fps.position.tooltip: Offsets the FPS display from the top-left or top-right corner of the screen.
extras.display_fps.right_align.name: Right-align FPS Display
extras.display_fps.right_align.tooltip: Aligns the FPS display to the right side of the screen. Useful if you have other overlays that show on the left side of the screen. Does nothing if the Display FPS option is set to Off.
extras.enable_max_entity_distance.name: Enable Max Entity Distance
extras.max_entity_distance.name: Max Entity Distance
extras.max_entity_distance.tooltip: Hides and does not tick entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around modded farms.
extras.vertical_entity_distance.name: Vertical Entity Distance
extras.vertical_entity_distance.tooltip: Hides and does not tick entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves. This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
extras.vertical_tile_distance.name: Vertical Tile Distance
extras.vertical_tile_distance.tooltip: Hides block entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves (if you have your machines in caves, for some reason). This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
extras.max_tile_distance.name: Max Tile Distance
extras.max_tile_distance.tooltip: Hides block entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around lots of modded machines.
extras.zoom.lower_sensitivity.name: Lower Zoom Sensitivity
extras.zoom.lower_sensitivity.tooltip: Lowers your sensitivity when zooming to make it feel more consistent.
extras.zoom.scrolling.name: Zoom Scrolling
extras.zoom.scrolling.tooltip: Allows using scroll wheel to adjust zoom amount.
extras.zoom.transition.name: Zoom Transition Mode
extras.zoom.transition.tooltip: Controls how the game changes from normal to zoomed. Off will be an instant transition.
extras.zoom.keybind.name: Zoom Keybind Mode
extras.zoom.keybind.tooltip:
Hold - Zoom only while the key is down.
Toggle - Lock zoom until you press the key again
Persistent - Always zoom, if you want that, for some reason.
extras.zoom.overlay.name: Zoom Overlay
extras.zoom.overlay.tooltip: Renders a vignette overlay when zooming.
extras.zoom.cinematic_camera.name: Cinematic Camera Options
extras.ture_darkness.options.name: True Darkness
extras.ture_darkness.options.tooltip: Makes the rest of the world more realistically dark. Does not effect daytime or torch light.
extras.ture_darkness.mode.name: True Darkness Mode
extras.ture_darkness.mode.tooltip: Controls how dark is considered true darkness.
